$description:
| What does this do? | Ensure multifactor authentication is enabled for all users and that all users are MFA capable |
| Why should you use this? | Requires an additional form of identification for all users, enhancing security. |
| What is the end-user impact? | All users will be required to enroll in multifactor authentication using phone, SMS, or an authentication application. |
| Learn more | [All users MFA strength](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/identity/conditional-access/policy-all-users-mfa-strength) |
$friendlyName: Baseline - Require MFA for All Users
